name: ElasticExportShopping24DE
description: This plugin adds the format Shopping24DE to the Elastic Export.
author: plentysystems AG
license: GNU AFFERO GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 3, 19 November 2007

shortDescription.de: Die Integration des Datenformats Shopping24DE-Plugin ermöglicht die Artikeldatenübertragung zum Preisportal shopping24.de über den elastischen Export.
shortDescription.en: The integration of the data format Shopping24DE-Plugin enables the transfer of item data to the price search engine shopping24.de via the elastic export.
